column17:
For all the beautiful ladies out there this digital watch from Breo comes as an ideal fashion add-ons. The watch is great and sports a design that is chic and trendy. Besides the watch is equipped with a calendar alarm backlit display plus a host of other features that sums up its value as a timepiece to hold on to.

Features
  • Gender: Female
  • Style: Fashion Luxury Sports watch
  • Band/Strap material: Polymer Resin
  • Band/Strap colour: Yellow
  • Case material: Resin
  • Case colour: Blue Pink Yellow
  • Case shape: Rectangle
  • Dial colour: Neon
  • Closure: Buckle closure
  • Water-resistance: Up to 100 m
  • Type/Movement: Digital
  • Add-ons: Alarm Timer Calendar Backlit display
  • Detailing: Designer bezel Sleek and trendy design
  • Warranty: 1 year manufacturer warranty


Care Tips
Clean your watch at least twice a week with a soft dry cloth.
Avoid direct contact with solvents detergents perfumes cosmetics alcohols etc.
Remove your watch before you lift heavy objects or do any heavy physical work.
